title:
Non-overlapping Schwarz methods in time for parabolic optimal control
  problems
authors: Martin Jakob Gander and Liu-Di Lu
abstract:
We present here the classical Schwarz method with a time domain decomposition
applied to unconstrained parabolic optimal control problems. Unlike
Dirichlet-Neumann and Neumann-Neumann algorithms, we find different properties
based on the forward-backward structure of the optimality system. Variants can
be found using only Dirichlet and Neumann transmission conditions. Some of
these variants are only good smoothers, while others could lead to efficient
solvers.
